secText:
Essential Questions:
1. How can we determine the rotational period and centripetal acceleration of an object in circular motion?
2. How can we determine the centripetal force acting on an object in circular motion?
3. How can we calculate the gravitational force between two objects?
4. How does an object remain in circular orbit?
5. How can we determine how long and how much energy it will take a planet to rotate around the Sun?
